alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 1:39PM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Elkhead and Park Mountains and Upper Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Blowing and drifting snow will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will also drop to -15 to -30 degrees overnight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
